EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining Pivotal at Gartner Application Strategies & Solutions Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for joining us at the Gartner Application Strategies & Solutions Summit last week, we hope you found it valuable!
Pivotal is passionate about partnering with our customers to help them grow their business and thrive in an era where software is eating the world! By helping customers adopt and implement modern app dev practices and methodologies that inform cultural transformations, Pivotal is changing the way the world builds software. Our cloud-native application platform, Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]> gives operations teams and app dev teams the right tools for achieving speed, security, stability, scalability, and savings.
But don’t take our word for it! Listen to just a few of our customers from the recent SpringOne Platform conference: Boeing <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-1-keynote-ted-colbert?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]>, Dick’s Sporting Goods <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/dicks-sporting-goods-jason-williams?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]>, U.S. Air Force <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-2-keynote-lauren-knausenberger-and-bryon-kroger?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]>, Stubhub <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-3-keynote-matt-swann?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]>, DBS Bank <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-3-keynote-siew-choo-soh?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]>, Rabobank <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/rabobank-vincent-oostindie?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]>, T-Mobile <[[https://content.pivotal.io/content-executives/making-multi-cloud-a-reality-at-t-mobile-brendan-aye-james-webb?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]>, West Corp <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/enabling-global-transformation-at-west-corp-thomas-squeo-cto-west-corp?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]>, Cloud-native Security Panel <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-2-keynote-panel-at-springone-platform-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]> - featuring Express Scripts, Mastercard, Merrill Corp, and West Corp.
You may also find these assets <[[https://content.pivotal.io/gartner-application-strategies-solutions-summit?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]> useful:
- The Cloud Native Journey eBook - This digital eBook by Michael Coté <[[https://pivotal.io/advocates?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]> explains how new cloud techniques and technologies can help your business become a software innovation factory. - Modernizing .NET Applications eBook - This eBook by Richard Seroter <[[https://pivotal.io/advocates?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]> explains how to responsibly modernize .NET apps so that you can consolidate your environments, add new functionality, upgrade and patch your dependencies, and automate parts of the delivery cycle. - Migrating to Cloud-Native Application Architectures eBook - This eBook by Matt Stine <[[https://pivotal.io/advocates?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]> helps developers learn how to architect and write cloud-native applications, as well as understand how to deploy and manage them. It examines the cultural, organizational, and technical changes necessary to migrate traditional monolithic applications and service-oriented architectures to cloud native architectures. - The Cloud-Native Platform eBook - This digital eBook by Duncan Winn <[[https://pivotal.io/advocates?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]> explains the essential capabilities of a platform needed to support cloud applications and examines the changes enterprises need to make in process, organization, and culture if they are to take advantage of this approach. - Thinking Architecturally - In this ebook, solution architect Nathaniel Schutta <[[https://pivotal.io/advocates?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]> guides tech leads, senior developers, junior developers, and of course, practicing architects through the process of appraising promising new technologies. - Cloud Native Foundations - This book by Cornelia Davis <[[https://pivotal.io/advocates?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-gartner-gaas-las-vegas-q418]]> presents a mental model for cloud-native applications, along with the patterns, practices, and tooling that sets them apart. In it, you'll find realistic examples and expert advice for working with apps, data, services, routing, and more.
Thanks again for your time in Las Vegas. We look forward to hearing from you!
The Pivotal Team
